summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ORSUNCER Long Wavy Ombre Blonde Wig for Women Middle Part Ash Blonde Wave Wigs Natural Looking Synthetic Hair for Daily Party Use 22 Inch
Review Date: 2021/08/26
Store: ORSUNCER
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '12.87 x 9.06 x 2.8 inches; 11.36 Ounces'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:606cee9a70225d667fe3ad067a503ff5]] Hi everyone! Okay so where do I start? I will be honest, I am a human hair wig girl normally. I haven’t worn a synthetic in years. That being said, trying new styles with expensive hair is hard because who wants to spend so much money just to see the hairstyle doesn’t look as good as they hoped? That’s why I tried this hair, it’s beautiful and affordable. I still had my concerns with it though. When I got it however, all those concerns went away. Not only is this hair soooo beautiful, it is so SOFT and BEYOND worth the price. You can run your fingers through it easily and there’s no tangling (which I was nervous about but was pleasantly surprised!) and also this hair looks exactly like human hair! If not better, because it retains it style easier and although the curls are so pretty and stay well, you can still run your fingers through them without even needing hairspray. I’ve only worn it a few times and already I have received so many compliments. There was also no weird smell or anything like some hair comes with which I was nervous about. If you’re unsure about this hair, do yourself a favor and BUY IT! You will love it!
Review Title: GET THIS WIG! 🔥
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: K'ryssma Hair
Review Date: 2021/09/04
Store: MOVEQUICK K'ryssma Hair
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Material': 'synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': "MOVEQUICK K'ryssma Hair", 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.63 x 8.19 x 2.44 inches; 10.19 Ounces', 'UPC': '663376594810 663376594834'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:538cc7523b782bb372de832e6eaa7368]] Okay so I have to go ahead and say, get this wig right off the bat. I always wear human hair, usually custom wigs, but I decided to branch out and try something new (inspired by Tiktok girls slaying the synthetic wigs). I am so glad that I did! I wasn’t sure how the frontal would look without being able to bleach the knots but it turned out. They aren’t bad like most synthetic units I’ve seen, and they’re easily plucked out. Especially if you can sit down and style this hair, it’s going to look amazing. I was super busy and didn’t get to do as much as I normally would so I wasn’t sure how it would look on, but it is so pretty! The hair feels just like human, and it’s a soft human texture at that. It looks very natural on, and it’s easy to get down with just some Got2B spray and an elastic band to tie it down. It took no time and it was ready to go. I can’t recommend this unit enough. For the price, you can’t beat it!
Review Title: Easy slay!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Morovan Poly Gel Kits - 6 Colors Poly Gel Nail Extension Kit Professional Poly Nail Gel Kits Starter Kit for Art Nail Beginners the Choice of Glitter Poly Gel Nail Kit DIY Salon at Home
Review Date: 2022/08/12
Store: Morovan
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Morovan', 'Included Components': 'Glitter', 'Item Weight': '15 Grams', 'Package Dimensions': '5.43 x 3.94 x 2.52 inches; 0.53 Ounces'}
Review Text: This polygel set is not only practical, but it works well! It’s beyond affordable and it’s also functional. I was able to create some cute designs with what was provided also. It is definitely worth the buy!
Review Title: Yes ma’am!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: IIFONII Eyelash Perm Kit, Professional 4-IN-1 Lash Lift Kit Eyebrow Lamination Kit Long-Lasting Curl, Upgraded Eyelash & Brow Lift Kit Make Lash Brow Lifted & Black Semi-Permanent Curling Suitable for Salon & Home
Review Date: 2022/08/12
Store: IIFONII
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'IIFONII', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Nourishing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.3 x 6.3 x 1.18 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 6.3 x 1.18 inches; 7.2 Ounces'}
Review Text: This set is great. I used it for my lashes, but truthfully I haven’t used it for my brows yet because I’m nervous. I think that you will love it though!
Review Title: Lash lifts are a yes!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel | Blush
Review Date: 2022/08/30
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Shape': 'Round', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '10.1 x 3.1 x 3 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2459', 'UPC': '810108191315'}
Review Text: So, I am usually someone who is pretty particular about hair items. This brush passed my test! I used it for a blowout and with my blow dryer it had wonderful results and left my naturally curly hair pretty smooth for straightening! I really would recommend this for anyone who wants a good brush to use for a blowout!
Review Title: YES!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analysis of the purchase history indicates a strong preference for beauty and haircare products, with an inclination towards experimenting with affordable synthetic options, particularly wigs. High ratings with consistent positive sentiments reveal satisfaction with quality and style, suggesting the user values aesthetics paired with functionality. 

Common themes across the purchases highlight a focus on versatility, as seen with both wigs designed for casual and party use and at-home beauty kits, implying a desire for easy-to-use products that yield salon-quality results. Quality is emphasized, especially in hair products, where the user appreciates softness and the natural appearance, often comparing synthetic hair to human hair. 

Price sensitivity is noted, as the user actively seeks affordable yet high-quality alternatives, exemplified by consistently seeking accessible beauty solutions without compromising on appearance or performance. This trend showcases a practical approach to beauty that aligns with current market offerings.

In synthesis, this individual favors stylish, multifunctional beauty products that balance affordability and quality, with a clear preference for synthetic hair solutions and DIY beauty tools.

target_interaction.title: Legit obsessed
target_interaction.text: This has become my new favorite brush. I use it not only for blowouts, but just for daily detangling. I absolutely love the way it gets through my hair with minimal effort, and I enjoy the way it feels in my hand. Great product!
target_interaction.title_meta: L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel
